function: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
static_description: The frontend application displays various sections dynamically populated from backend APIs. It includes navigation links, user/coach dashboards, forms for assessments and profiles, and interactive elements styled with beige background and saddle brown components.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on any dynamic link or button triggers an API call to fetch relevant data from the backend and updates the UI accordingly.

resource_dependency.database_schema: Database schema must include tables: users, coaches, sessions, goals, assessments, matches, and progress_logs. Each table will have appropriate primary keys and foreign key relationships as needed.

function: A backend API server that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
static_description: Backend API server running at http://localhost:3001 serving RESTful endpoints for user/coach data, authentication, assessments, scheduling, and goal tracking. All endpoints connect to the configured PostgreSQL database via provided environment variables.

interaction_and_states.description: Each incoming request is authenticated, validated, and processed by querying or updating the connected PostgreSQL database based on the route and parameters.

function: User authentication and authorization system for coaches and users
static_description: Login and registration pages with email/password fields and role selection (user or coach). Forms submit to respective backend endpoints and display success/error messages after submission.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Login' or 'Register' submits form data to the backend. Upon successful login, JWT token is stored in localStorage and redirects to respective dashboard.
Validation errors are displayed inline if credentials do not meet requirements or if account already exists.

resource_dependency.assessment_questions: [{id: number, question_text: string, options: [{value: string, label: string}]}]

function: Personality assessment functionality with interactive questionnaire interface
static_description: Interactive questionnaire page displaying multiple-choice questions sequentially. Navigation buttons ('Previous', 'Next') allow moving between questions. Final step shows summary before submitting to backend.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Next' saves current answer and moves to next question. Clicking 'Submit' sends completed assessment to backend endpoint and navigates to results/matching page.
Choosing an option highlights it visually and stores the selection temporarily until submission.

resource_dependency.profile_data_schema: users table with fields: id, name, email, bio, avatar_url, created_at, updated_at

function: User profile creation and management with editable personal information
static_description: Profile view showing userâ€™s name, email, bio, and avatar. Editable form allows modification of these fields. Save and cancel buttons control saving changes or reverting edits.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Edit Profile' enables editing mode. Clicking 'Save Changes' sends updated data to backend. Clicking 'Cancel' reverts unsaved changes.
Modifying input fields updates local state which gets submitted when saved.

resource_dependency.coach_profile_schema: coaches table with fields: id, user_id, specializations, experience_years, hourly_rate, availability_schedule, created_at, updated_at

function: Coach profile creation and management with specialization and experience details
static_description: Coach profile view displaying specializations, years of experience, hourly rate, and weekly availability schedule. Editable form allows modifying these fields along with save/cancel controls.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Edit Coach Profile' activates editing mode. Saving sends updated data to backend. Canceling discards temporary changes.
Changing inputs like hourly rate or adding specializations updates internal state ready for saving.

resource_dependency.filter_options: Specialization categories, rating filters, price range sliders

function: Search and filtering functionality for users to find suitable coaches
static_description: Search bar with filter dropdowns for specialization, ratings, and price ranges. Results grid shows coach cards with names, photos, specialties, ratings, and prices.

interaction_and_states.description: Typing triggers debounced API calls to update search results dynamically without manual refresh.
Applying filters modifies query parameters sent to the backend and reloads filtered results.

resource_dependency.assessment_results_schema: assessments table storing user responses linked to user_id

function: Matching algorithm or mechanism to suggest coaches based on personality assessment results
static_description: Results page showing recommended coaches aligned with user's personality traits derived from their assessment. Displays coach cards with compatibility scores and reasons.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon loading, page makes API call to retrieve matched coaches based on user's assessment history.
Clicking a coach card navigates to full profile view for more detailed information.

function: Scheduling system for booking one-to-one coaching sessions
static_description: Calendar interface showing available timeslots for selected coach. Selected date/time confirms session booking through modal confirmation dialog.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a slot opens confirmation modal. Confirming creates session entry in backend and updates calendar availability.
Submitting the booking form posts session details to backend and redirects to session confirmation page.

function: Session management dashboard to view upcoming and past coaching sessions
static_description: Dashboard with two tabs: 'Upcoming Sessions' and 'Past Sessions'. Lists show session dates, coach info, status indicators, and action buttons.

interaction_and_states.description: Switching tabs loads corresponding list of sessions from backend.
Actions like reschedule or cancel open modals to modify session details via backend updates.

function: Goal setting interface allowing users to define personalized coaching objectives
static_description: Goal creation form with title, description, target date, category selector, and priority level. Submit button sends new goal to backend.

interaction_and_states.description: Filling out form prepares payload for submission upon clicking 'Save Goal'.
Submitting form sends POST request to backend and adds new goal to user's list.

function: Progress tracking visualization to monitor goal achievement over time
static_description: Visual charts (line/bar) displaying user progress towards goals over weeks/months. Data points reflect milestones achieved and remaining targets.

interaction_and_states.description: Changing time frame (weekly/monthly/yearly) fetches updated chart data from backend.
Hovering over chart points reveals tooltip with specific milestone details.

function: Responsive web design with beige background and saddle brown colored components
static_description: Entire website uses beige (#f5f5dc) as main background color and saddle brown (#8b4513) for interactive and structural components across all screen sizes.

interaction_and_states.description: Layout adjusts responsively maintaining consistent styling and usability on mobile, tablet, and desktop views.

resource_dependency.scripts_block: { "install:all": "concurrently \"cd client && npm install\" \"cd server && npm install\"" }

function: Package.json configuration with 'install:all' script for frontend and backend installation
static_description: Root package.json file contains custom 'install:all' script that runs npm install simultaneously in both client and server directories using concurrently package.

interaction_and_states.description: Executing `npm run install:all` initiates parallel installations in frontend and backend folders.

resource_dependency.dev_script_block: { "dev": "concurrently \"cd client && npm run dev\" \"cd server && npm run dev\"" }

function: Package.json configuration with 'dev' script to start frontend and backend concurrently
static_description: Root package.json defines 'dev' command that launches both frontend development server and backend API server together using concurrently utility.

interaction_and_states.description: Running `npm run dev` starts both applications side-by-side enabling simultaneous development workflow.
